title: Konoba Marko Polo
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Mediterranean, Beer/Wine, Croatian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Pleasant, open konoba on the sea catering to tourists with menu in several languages. One of just two eateries in Kneza. Offerings include pasta, homous, marmalade, wine. Several vegetarian items on the menu, may be adapted to suit vegan diets -- ask, owners are receptive. The desserts are dairy based.
